meanings.definition: Not recorded in an official register or list.
meanings.sent1: The unregistered car was not in the system.
meanings.sent2: She found an unregistered book in the library.
meanings.sent3: The unregistered student tried to sneak into the event.
meanings.sent4: His unregistered presence at the meeting raised suspicions.
meanings.sent5: The unregistered item was like a ghost in the records.

meanings.definition: Not having official or legal status.
meanings.sent1: The unregistered business was operating illegally.
meanings.sent2: He was an unregistered member of the club.
meanings.sent3: The unregistered pet caused chaos in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her unregistered marriage was not recognized by the government.
meanings.sent5: Living as an unregistered citizen was challenging.

meanings.definition: Not having a registration number or identification.
meanings.sent1: The unregistered package had no label.
meanings.sent2: An unregistered phone was found at the park.
meanings.sent3: The unregistered puppy ran around without a collar.
meanings.sent4: The unregistered email was flagged as spam.
meanings.sent5: Trying to find the unregistered item was like a treasure hunt.
